app.title: Aventuria Impromptu
app.tagline: Tools, tables, and inspiration for Aventuria game masters.

hero.title: Your Aventurian Toolbox
hero.intro: Aventuria Impromptu helps you pull encounters, loot, and taverns out of thin air. Stay in the flow—no page flipping required.

tavern.title: Taverns on Demand
tavern.description: Bring any inn to life: improvised barkeeps, rough patrons, and rumours for spur-of-the-moment sessions.

npcLoot.title: Loot for NPCs
npcLoot.description: Quick rewards for captured raiders, defeated henchmen, or curious rogues—always Aventuria-friendly.

treasureLoot.title: Treasure Hoards & Caches
treasureLoot.description: Hidden warehouses, dragon hoards, or ruined temples—roll fitting treasures with flavour.

tavern.title: Tavern Generator
tavern.intro: Fill Aventurian taprooms with life: roll encounters, quirks, and rumours for spontaneous scenes.

npcLoot.title: Loot: Non-Player Characters
npcLoot.intro: Pat-downs or raids? Grab fitting finds for city watch, pilgrims, or shady types.

treasureLoot.title: Loot: Treasure Chest
treasureLoot.intro: Abandoned temples, secret depots, or freshly plundered caravans—craft treasures with Aventurian flair.

optolithConverter.title: Optolith Converter
optolithConverter.intro: Convert German DSA5 stat blocks into Optolith NPC JSON directly in your browser.

roll20Note.prefix: The converter’s main purpose is to produce an import file for the DSA5 character sheet on
roll20Note.suffix: so you can spin up NPCs there faster.

optolithConverter.languageNote: Only German stat blocks are supported. Adjust the source material before converting other languages.

steps.paste: Paste the complete stat block into the field below.
steps.convert: Hit "Convert Stat Block" once the text looks correct.
steps.review: Review warnings and the normalized stat block for manual clean-up.
steps.download: Download the Optolith JSON and import it into the desktop app.

input.label: Stat block
input.tooLong: The stat block exceeds the supported length.

about.title: About
about.intro: Details about the Aventuria toolbox and the current build version.

body.paragraph1: Aventuria Impromptu is a lean toolkit for GMs in Aventuria. The tables rely on classic random rolls and deliver flavourful results for improvised scenes.
body.paragraph2: The app stays deliberately lightweight: no servers, just Vue 3, Vite, and a touch of Bootstrap.
